precondition: User has opened a word processing application.
action: Navigate to the 'File' menu and select 'New' to create a new document.
expected_results: A new, untitled document window opens, ready for text input.

precondition: User is working on an untitled document.
action: Type the desired content into the new document.
expected_results: The document now contains the user's inputted text.

precondition: User has finished typing and wishes to save the document.
action: Navigate to the 'File' menu and select 'Save As'.

precondition: The 'Save As' dialog box is open.
The user is in the 'Reports/Term Papers' directory within the 'Save As' dialog box.
action: Select 'WordPerfect 3' from the format dropdown menu.
expected_results: The format for the saved file is set to 'WordPerfect 3'.

precondition: The user has selected the file format.
action: Enter a file name in the 'Save As' dialog box.

precondition: The user has entered a file name.
action: Click the 'Save' button in the dialog box.
expected_results: The document is saved in the specified format and location.

precondition: User needs to open an existing document.
action: Navigate to the 'File' menu and select 'Open'.

precondition: The user is in the 'Reports/Term Papers' folder within the 'Open' dialog box.
expected_results: The document is highlighted for opening.

precondition: The user has selected a document to open.
action: Click the 'Open' button in the dialog box.
expected_results: The selected document opens for viewing or editing.
